CHAT.comment: BRENT TAYLOR, Petitioner v. ROBERT A. STURGELL, ACTING ADMINISTRATOR, FEDERAL AVIATION ADMINISTATION, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:26 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ADINA ROSENBAUM ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DOUGLAS HALLWARD-DRIEMEIER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
ORAL ARGUMENT CATHERINE E. STETSON ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF ADINA H. ROSENBAUM, ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon at 12:26 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
